dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3763741G] Template Monster www.templatemonster.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2007 8:40 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3763741G] Template Monster www.templatemonster.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Template Monster www.templatemonster.com Added by system at Thursday, Apr 5 2007 04:06 pm X-MailFrom: nwolff@cdas.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Apr 5 16:06:17 2007 Received: (qmail 8523 invoked by alias); 5 Apr 2007 21:06:17 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 8516 invoked from network); 5 Apr 2007 21:06:15 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 5 Apr 2007 21:06:15 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 5 Apr 2007 16:06:15 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 05 Apr 2007 16:06:15 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from nwolff@cdas.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HZZ9q-0001wX-NX for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 05 Apr 2007 16:06:15 -0500 Received: from mclaren.electric.net ([216.129.90.240]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from nwolff@cdas.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HZZ9b-000Aq6-Td for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 05 Apr 2007 16:06:00 -0500 Received: from root by mclaren.electric.net with emc1-ok (Exim 4.62) (envelope-from ) id 1HZZ9Z-0003L0-Ty; Thu, 05 Apr 2007 14:05:57 -0700 Received: by emcmailer; Thu, 05 Apr 2007 14:05:57 -0700 Received: from [63.145.17.42] (helo=wolffie) by mclaren.electric.net with esmtpa (Exim 4.62) (envelope-from ) id 1HZZ9Y-0003Jo-Tv; Thu, 05 Apr 2007 14:05:57 -0700 From: "Nancy Wolff" To: Cc: "'Miffy Evans'" Subject: Template Monster www.templatemonster.com Date: Thu, 5 Apr 2007 17:05:52 -0400 Message-ID: <000701c777c6$321315d0$5f01a8c0@workgroup.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0008_01C777A4.AB0175D0" X-Priority: 1 (Highest) X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 Thread-Index: Acd3xjFBzquO93RYRVKZlWb2nDap1w== X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 Importance: High X-Outbound-IP: 63.145.17.42 X-Env-From: nwolff@cdas.com X-Virus-Status: Scanned by VirusSMART (c) X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Apr 2007 21:06:15.0462 (UTC) FILETIME=[3F6BFC60:01C777C6] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Re: DMCA copyright infringement To Whom It May Concern: I represent Image Source Ltd., the owner or exclusive licensor of the identified photographs and who has authorized me to act on its behalf for copyright infringement notification. Infringements of 180 images Image Source photographs (the "Photographs") have been detected on the Web site http://www.templatemonster.com which we believe is hosted by EV1. The details of the infringing uses are listed on the annexed spread sheet which identifies the image and the location on the website for easy removal. This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the detected infringements. I hereby request that you IMMEDIATELY issue a cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified posting and prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web address, www.template.monster from further posting the Photographs to your servers in the future. Please be advised that by law, as a service provider, you must "expeditiously remove or disable access to" the infringing photograph(s) upon receiving this notice. Noncompliance may result in a loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA. I have a good faith belief that use of the images by Template Monster is not authorized by Image Source, its licensing representatives, or the law. The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Image Source for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material. Please confirm by email or telephone that you have complied with your obligations under the DMCA by removing the Photographs. Very truly yours, Nancy E. Wolff Nancy E. Wolff nwolff@cdas.com In compliance with DMCA notice requirements, Image Source is the exclusive licensee or copyright owner with respect to each image identified on the annexed spread sheet. The spread sheet identifies the image and the location on the website for easy removal. I am authorized on Image Sources' behalf to provide official notification under the provisions of Section 512(c) of the DMCA to effect removal of the detected infringements of these images. I therefore request that you advise Template Monster to immediately issue a cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified postings and to cease from posting the infringing images in the future. Please advise me whether your client will effect the removal by the end of the day Monday, April 2. Otherwise we will inform the ISP who will be required to immediately effect removal I have a good faith belief that use of the images by Template Monster is not authorized by Image Source, its licensing representatives, or the law. The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Image Source for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material. Nancy E. Wolff Cowan DeBaets Abrahams & Sheppard LLP 41 Madison Avenue, 34th floor New York, NY 10010 Tel: (212) 974-7474 Fax: (212) 974-8474 Email: nwolff@cdas.com Privileged/Confidential Information may be contained in this message. If you are not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for delivery the message to such person), you may not copy or deliver this message to anyone. In such case, you should destroy this message and kindly notify the sender by reply email. Please advise immediately if you or your employer does not consent to Internet email for message of this kind. Opinions, conclusions and other information in this message that do not relate to the official business of my firm shall be understood as neither given nor endorsed by it. MIME element (text/html)

 

Re:  DMCA copyright infringement

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

I represent Image Source Ltd., the owner or exclusive licensor of the identified photographs and who has authorized me to act on its behalf for copyright infringement notification.

 

Infringements of 180 images Image Source photographs (the “Photographs”) have been detected on the Web site http://www.templatemonster.com which we believe is hosted by EV1.  The details of the infringing uses are listed on the annexed spread sheet which identifies the image and the location on the website for easy removal.

 

This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the detected infringements.  I hereby request that you IMMEDIATELY issue a cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified posting and prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web address, www.template.monster from further posting the Photographs to your servers in the future. Please be advised that by law, as a service provider, you must “expeditiously remove or disable access to” the infringing photograph(s) upon receiving this notice. Noncompliance may result in a loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA.

 

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the images by Template Monster is not authorized by Image Source, its licensing representatives, or the law.  The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Image Source for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.

 

Please confirm by email or telephone that you have complied with your obligations under the DMCA by removing the Photographs.

 

Very truly yours,

 

Nancy E. Wolff

Nancy E. Wolff

nwolff@cdas.com

 

 

 

 

In compliance with DMCA notice requirements, Image Source is the exclusive licensee or copyright owner with respect to each image identified on the annexed spread sheet. The spread sheet identifies the image and the location on the website for easy removal.  I am authorized on Image Sources’ behalf to provide official notification under the provisions of Section 512(c) of the DMCA to effect removal of the detected infringements of these images.  I therefore request that you advise Template Monster to immediately issue a cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified postings and to cease from posting the infringing images in the future.

 

Please advise me whether your client will effect the removal by the end of the day Monday, April 2. Otherwise we will inform the ISP who will be required to immediately effect removal

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the images by Template Monster is not authorized by Image Source, its licensing representatives, or the law.  The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Image Source for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.

 

 

Nancy E. Wolff
Cowan DeBaets Abrahams & Sheppard LLP
41 Madison Avenue, 34th floor
New York, NY 10010
Tel:  (212) 974-7474
Fax: (212) 974-8474
Email: nwolff@cdas.com

 

Privileged/Confidential Information may be contained in this message. If you are not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for delivery the message to such person), you may not copy or deliver this message to anyone. In such case, you should destroy this message and kindly notify the sender by reply email. Please advise immediately if you or your employer does not consent to Internet email for message of this kind. Opinions, conclusions and other information in this message that do not relate to the official business of my firm shall be understood as neither given nor endorsed by it.
